author: Lisa Slagle
text:
I am trying to gather sample RFPs for real estate services for the City of Fort Lauderdale.
Services include appraisal, surplus propery sale, acquisitions, maintenance/Management and feasibility or market studies.
Does anyone have an RFP for all or some of these services that they could send me or direct where I can review?
title: Real Estate Services for Municipalities
